dialogueSection.text: Jones: Hi there Sully, here for the usual?
Sully: Not today Jones, I'm looking for someone.
Sully: I need to talk to Jack the Fink, you seen him around?
Jones: [Shifty] No, not seen him here for a long time. I don't even remember him actually.

option.text: Sully: [Threaten] Well you better try real hard to remember, I'm not in the mood for games!
option.reply: Jones: No one threatens me in my bar! Eat lead!

option.text: Sully: [Bribe] Well maybe this will help you remember
option.reply: Jones: Now that you mention it, I do remember something. He's over there in the corner.

option.text: Sully: [Mock] Maybe you're too stupid to remember.
option.reply: Jones: Oh yeah? Well if I was too stupid I wouldn't know he is over there in the corner!

dialogueSection.text: Sully: Hey Jack, I have some questions for you!
Jack: Oh yeah? What do you want?
Sully: What is this symbol? What does it mean?
Jack: I don't know, ain't never seen that before.

option.text: Sully: [Threaten] We can play this the easy way or the hard way. Me, I'm hoping it's the hard way!
option.reply: Jack: Ok! Ok! No need to get violent. I'll tell you what I know.

option.text: Sully: [Insult] You idiot! I know you're lying.
option.reply: Jack: Well I guess I'll just have to kill you then!

option.text: Sully: [Honesty] Listen, I'm a detective investigating a murder and I need your help.
option.reply: Jack: Hey Guys! We got a cop poking around here! -- [A group of gangsters comes into the bar from the back and shoot you]

dialogueSection.text: Jack: That symbol is supposed to point you to the Gambelli crime family.
Sully: The Gambelli family? They don't operate outside the docks.
Jack: I heard there is this guy who lives on the corner of 28th street who has been making these. Goes by the name Tony Torrino.
Sully: Thanks for the info, I'll head right there.
